title: CERC Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Staff Consultant Posts
description: The Central Electricity Regulatory Commission (CERC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Staff Consultant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech and MBA students can apply for the CERC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age lim...
